actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to clarify that section 457 does not apply to certain deferred compensation.

summary.text: Section 457 Clarification Act of 1988 - Amends Internal Revenue Code accounting rules governing the year of inclusion of compensation deferred under qualified plans of State and local governments and of private tax-exempt organizations. Declares the rules to be inapplicable to nonelective deferred compensation under basic employee benefits, including bona fide vacation plans, sick leave plans, and similar benefits.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to clarify that section 457 does not apply to certain deferred compensation.
